game.name: Train Simulator: Penn Central Pack 01
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Climb aboard and take the throttle of Penn Central’s memorable and diverse diesel motive power and relive challenging 1960s and 1970s railroading – with High Iron Simulation’s Penn Central Pack 01 for Train Simulator!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Climb aboard and take the throttle of Penn Central’s memorable and diverse diesel motive power and relive challenging 1960s and 1970s railroading – with High Iron Simulation’s Penn Central Pack 01 for Train Simulator!
